title: New: Jimi Charles Moody – The Woman
content:
Jimi Charles Moody is the moniker of a currently anonymous UK chart topper.

Whoever this may be, one things for sure, he makes one hell of a soul/blues infused pop track. Not much info is available online, but all three of his currently shared track are pretty spectacular, with new cut The Woman soaring with the confidence of someone who has clearly honed their craft. His voice is dark and brooding, coupled with heavy handed piano and melodramatic strings, creating a sound that is definitely hard to ignore.

Stream The Woman below as well as previously released track Other Man:

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
